name: Rewind (itch) (oohicksyoo, BorroTheLeader)
description:
Invade and destroy alien planets using crazy alien rewinding technology. 

This game was made in a little under a week for the Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam. The theme was Rewind, which is also our games name. 2 of us worked together to bring this little demo to life.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space/W - Jump

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Shoot

E - Rewind time using your control orbs (Gain back some health doing so)
